plot outline: Best of Luck Laalu is a film about a sixteen-year old boy, Amatya A.K.A Laalu Modi, who is in SSC. His mother, Daksha Modi, a middle-class working woman wants to see her son in the merit list, so that he can have a better future in a better world. Laalu too is a dedicated student and also wants to fulfill her mother's dream. But like any other student his life too is like a roller-coaster, filled with fun and pressure to score well in the Board exams. Laalu's grandfather, Haresh Modi is also a part of Laalu's hectic preparation, and tries to add fun in the filled with pressure life. Amidst all the havoc of 10th standard preparation, Laalu also has a love interest Forum, and shares a new aged, "first love" angle with her. The film is a sweet, simple, fun take on the situation of a 10th standard student which awaits a lot of drama and twists and turns.
title: Best of Luck Laalu
akas: Best Of Luck Laalu (India, English title)
plot: Story of a bright young student, who in spite of all the conventional teenage distractions and pressures around him, hopes to make a great mark in a board exam, with the help of his ever supporting family.

_Best of Luck Laalu_ (qv) is a film about a sixteen-year old boy, Amatya A.K.A Laalu Modi, who is in SSC. His mother, Daksha Modi, a middle-class working woman wants to see her son in the merit list, so that he can have a better future in a better world. Laalu too is a dedicated student and also wants to fulfill her mother's dream. But like any other student his life too is like a roller-coaster, filled with fun and pressure to score well in the Board exams. Laalu's grandfather, Haresh Modi is also a part of Laalu's hectic preparation, and tries to add fun in the filled with pressure life. Amidst all the havoc of 10th standard preparation, Laalu also has a love interest Forum, and shares a new aged, "first love" angle with her. The film is a sweet, simple, fun take on the situation of a 10th standard student which awaits a lot of drama and twists and turns.::Kirtan Sharma
